thread.section_title: Snowcountry Beoordelingen | Beoordelingen van Snowcountry | snowcountry.eu
thread.title: Barbara Everitt

author: Barbara Everitt
title: Barbara Everitt
text: I ordered a pair of skis online as they were out of stock with UK suppliers. The ordering and payment process was easy and I was promptly contacted to confirm my order and request details of my ski boots etc to set my bindings. I was kept informed at every stage and was sent a real time link to track my order after dispatch. My skis arrived in perfect condition and with a free upgrade to the bindings in less than 3 days. Excellent service from beginning to end.
